explains: v. 放在……外面；在撒谎上胜过（outlie 的 ing 形式）

sentences.en: Tourists can visit outlying areas like the Napa Valley Wine Country.
sentences.cn: 游客可以去纳帕谷酒乡这样的边远地区。

sentences.en: Many are housebound because of inadequate public transport in most outlying suburbs.
sentences.cn: 由于大多数偏远郊区的公共交通不足，许多人都不出门。

sentences.en: The outlying villages were formally annexed by the town last year.
sentences.cn: 那些偏远的村庄于去年正式被并入该镇。
